title: [GAMEPLAY] Vayne's classic art in-game is blue.
body:
1. Last 2 games that I played we had vayne players with classic skins, splash arts and icons were perfect, no errors, but when we entered in-game I encountered the bug.. The complete art on vayne was full blue, like missing image or something like that ._. (i suck at this.. let just the pics show you what i mean..)
2. It just happened, I didnt do anything, the game loaded vayne's in-game model without any textures or graphics, full blue model.
3. As I said, this happened the last 2 games I played.. I will play one again to see will it happen again.
Here are some images of the bug:
a) http://i.imgur.com/BRmxZgb.jpg
b) http://i.imgur.com/YLAkdZz.jpg
c) http://i.imgur.com/9uJpIgr.jpg
d) http://i.imgur.com/p8Tu48V.jpg
e) http://i.imgur.com/vAVpEPO.jpg
f) http://i.imgur.com/jVO7y9H.jpg
g) http://i.imgur.com/GxdtuYf.jpg
h) http://i.imgur.com/07se6qm.jpg
i) http://i.imgur.com/6r8McG7.jpg
j) http://i.imgur.com/VzxTfPL.jpg
Tried to ask the others, do they have the same bug/problem, but they didnt said anything..

I hope this is topic is correct, if not then please tell me.

replies.body:
Hey Kimochii x3!

Thanks for the great bug report - images are always helpful! 

It appears that you're missing textures (this blue is indicative of missing textures, and also shows up for missing particles!)

The client updates files on a pretty frequent basis, which means it's entirely possible some files got jumbled  around and ended up misplaced. 

In this case, I'd suggest performing a client repair. You can do that by launching the client and clicking on the [?] button on the upper right corner of the client. (It's on the 'launch' page, not the login screen.) There will be an option to repair your client - select that! Doing this will correct errors in your files, and should resolve this issue! If you're still experiencing this afterwards, please feel free to let me know!
I think your game files are corrupt. The blue could be caused because the textures were missing. You may want to validate game files.
